      • buildHeader

        public static void buildHeader(DataBuffer buffer,
                               OutMessage sendMessage,
                               int noOfMessages)
        Builds the header of the message. The length value is inserted later so 0 is added as a place holder value. The header structure is |source|flags|destinationID|length|
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer to which the header is placed
        sendMessage - the message that the header is build for
        noOfMessages - number of messages in this single message
